attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst kidnapping is common place in Nigeria, British have to work there even against Foreign Office Advice. It would be helpful if Government did not make headline grabbing statements that provoke militants in the Delta which make them hold hostages longer.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Foreign Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
